description: REMnux is a Linux toolkit for reverse-engineering and analyzing malicious software.
name: chromefinch/remnux:development
notes:
A number of applications including VSCode and proxy browser within Burpsuite may require relaxed security in order to run correctly.

Adding: {"security_opt":["seccomp=unconfined"]} to the Docker Run Config Override (JSON) above may help these programs run with better compatibility.
